biotools.summary: DeepSVFilter is a deep learning based tool designed to filter false positive structural variants (SVs) obtained by any computational approaches from short read whole genome sequencing data. It can be used as either a stand-alone tool to filter SVs or coupled with commonly used SV detection tool to improve specificity.
